MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK13 postcode area of Tillicoultry. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. For safety reasons we have had to drop supplies to further properties at 6:23am due to a fault at the Mayfield Avenue substation and our team are arranging generators and further resources to assist in restoring supplies. We now expect your supply to be restored by 4.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29am on Thursday, 24th December 2020.
